description: A cienaCesImproperCmdInConfigFile notification signifies that the SNMP entity, acting in
an agent role, has detected that improper commands were found in the
configuration file while processing the cienaCesSystemConfigFileName. The
cienaCesSystemConfigErrLinesTotal specifies the number of the lines in the
configuration file that failed. To enable the device to send this notification:
cienaCesSystemConfigImproperCmdTrapState must be set to enabled.
cienaCesSystemConfigImproperCmdTrapState is enabled by default. Variable bindings
include: cienaGlobalSeverity, cienaGlobalMacAddress, cienaCesSystemConfigFileName, and
cienaCesSystemConfigErrLinesTotal.

event.Summary: $v4 command lines failed in config file $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-SYSTEM-CONFIG-MIB::cienaCesImproperCmdInConfigFile CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 5 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-SYSTEM-CONFIG-MIB::cienaCesSystemConfigFileName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-SYSTEM-CONFIG-MIB::cienaCesSystemConfigErrLinesTotal i 7

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: The name of the configuration file.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-SYSTEM-CONFIG-MIB::cienaCesSystemConfigFileName

description: This object is sent in the cienaCesImproperCmdInConfigFile
notification to identify the total line numbers that failed when the
configuration was applied.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-SYSTEM-CONFIG-MIB::cienaCesSystemConfigErrLinesTotal

description: Indicates that a command file has been successfully downloaded
and executed.

event.Summary: Command file $v4 successfully downloaded and executed

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-SYSTEM-CONFIG-MIB::cienaCesCommandFileCompletedNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-SYSTEM-CONFIG-MIB::cienaCesCommandFileHost s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-SYSTEM-CONFIG-MIB::cienaCesCommandFileName s EXAMPLE

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: The host name or IP address of the file server from which an
attempt was made to download a command file. This object is
contained in cienaCesCommandFileCompletedNotification and
cienaCesCommandFileFailedNotification, which report the status
of the download and execution attempt of that command file.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-SYSTEM-CONFIG-MIB::cienaCesCommandFileHost

description: The name of the command file whose status is reported by
cienaCesCommandFileCompletedNotification or
cienaCesCommandFileFailedNotification after an attempt was made
to download and execute the file.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-SYSTEM-CONFIG-MIB::cienaCesCommandFileName

description: Indicates that a failure occurred while downloading or executing
a command file.

event.Summary: Failure to download and/or execute command file $v4 due to $v5

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-SYSTEM-CONFIG-MIB::cienaCesCommandFileFailedNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-SYSTEM-CONFIG-MIB::cienaCesCommandFileHost s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-SYSTEM-CONFIG-MIB::cienaCesCommandFileName s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-SYSTEM-CONFIG-MIB::cienaCesCommandFileError s EXAMPLE

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: The host name or IP address of the file server from which an
attempt was made to download a command file. This object is
contained in cienaCesCommandFileCompletedNotification and
cienaCesCommandFileFailedNotification, which report the status
of the download and execution attempt of that command file.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-SYSTEM-CONFIG-MIB::cienaCesCommandFileHost

description: The name of the command file whose status is reported by
cienaCesCommandFileCompletedNotification or
cienaCesCommandFileFailedNotification after an attempt was made
to download and execute the file.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-SYSTEM-CONFIG-MIB::cienaCesCommandFileName

description: A description of the reason for the failure to download or
execute a command file, contained in
cienaCesCommandFileFailedNotification.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-SYSTEM-CONFIG-MIB::cienaCesCommandFileError
